title: What If
description: Rae and Nate have known each other forever. Her family has always considered him as one of their own. So when he recently came back to their life after a long absence, the two of them slowly bonded. But Rae is scarred by the event from her past, making her unable to let someone completely in, and determined to keep everything under control. Until she started having feelings for a family friend. Nate has a secret on his own. He's the kind of a man who isn’t afraid of losing his life. Yet, he finds himself afraid of living it without her. Will they break the walls surrounding them or will they forever wonder - What if…?
author: Bella Rye
